name: Рождество обитателей леса
summary: A Father Christmas ornament climbs down from a decorated tree, and goes to the forest. There he creates and decorates a Christmas tree for the forest creatures. He then invites all the insects, along with a friendly frog, to come and enjoy the gifts he has prepared, and to celebrate Christmas.
info:
• 中文名: 昆虫的圣诞夜
  • 话数: 1
  • 导演: Старевич, Владислав Александрович
  • 脚本: Старевич, Владислав Александрович
  • 别名: The Insects' Christmas
  • 别名: Rozhdestvo obitatelei lesa
  • 上映年度: 1913年
  • 片长: 7min
